coloredTexts.text: The Netherite is not the hardest material, It is rumored that in the Etheral Abyss there is Stellium, a harder material.
Step by step, stone by stone. Create your own path my friend.
I lick my stones to know it well, and quartz taste like hell. Ugh.
I love clay. It can take so many forms!
Even stone can be beautiful if you know how to work it.
In rock-papers-scissors everyone beats me and I don't know why.
